member.summary: Register the current service manager as a valid dependency.

member.summary: Builds all registered singletons.

member.name: M:Slim.IServiceManager.HandleException``1(System.Func{Slim.IServiceProvider,``0,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Marks a type of exception to be caught and handled.
member.param: Handler of the exception. Handler returns true if the exception should be thrown again.

member.name: M:Slim.IServiceManager.Clear
member.summary: Clears all registered types, singletons, factories and exception handlers.

member.summary: Register a resolver that manually resolves dependencies.
member.param: Resolver that manually creates a dependency.

member.name: M:Slim.ServiceManager.RegisterResolver(Slim.Resolvers.IDependencyResolver)
